items.sentence: My doctor told me to stay at home for a week.
Tom almost never goes to bed before midnight.
I think you know we have to help Tom do that.
I thought I told you to keep the door closed.
Can\'t you move your stuff to the other room?
Come on in. We\'re just about to get started.
I don\'t know what I\'d do in that situation.
I don\'t know what I\'m going to do with you.
Tom thought he was going to have a good time.
Tom thought he was smarter than anybody else.
Tom thought something was wrong with his car.
Tom thought that Mary wanted him to kiss her.
Tom thought that Mary was being unreasonable.
Tom didn\'t think that movie was interesting.
Tom didn\'t run fast enough to catch the bus.
Tom didn\'t think Mary would enjoy his party.
We have exclusive rights to Tom\'s invention.
We couldn\'t ask for a better French teacher.
Tom declined the invitation to Mary\'s party.
Tom had a week\'s worth of beard on his face.
